name: Padlocked
description:
Padlocked is an atmospheric platformer game with a mysterious vibe, in which you control Locky - a tiny padlock that traverses dark tunnels and cellars in search for keys. Run, jump, bounce and swing on chains to reach your goal!

------------

This build is a prototype that consists of 3 levels played on a loop.  If it proves interesting enough I'll develop more . Any feedback you could give me would be greatly appreciated. :)
